identifiedDependencies.reason: For client-side PDF parsing and image extraction.

assetInstructions:
This tool requires the PDF.js worker file to be available in the public directory.

1. Ensure that the `pdf.worker.mjs` file from the `pdfjs-dist` npm package (typically found in `node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.mjs`) is copied to the `public/libs/pdfjs-dist/build/` directory of your project. The tool's hook (`usePdfMediaExtraction.ts`) will attempt to load it from `/libs/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.mjs`.
